import React, {useState} from 'react'; import '../../../App.css'; import Footer from '../../Footer'; import Navbar from '../../Navbar'; import './Contact.css' import axios from "axios" function Contact() { const [input, setInput] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '', }) function handleChange(event){ const {name, value} = event.target; setInput(prevInput => { return{ ...prevInput, [name] : value } }) } function handleClick(event){ event.preventDefault(); const newContact = { name: input.name, email: input.email, message: input.message } axios.post('http://localhost:3001/create', newContact) } return ( <>

); } export default Contact;
